entries.summary: Historical reference normalised: Gorji Dinks corrected to Gorji Dinka
entries.detail: The document title 'Gorji Dinks Meeting With High Commissioner' and its derived slug contained a transcription error. Corrected to 'Gorji Dinka' in documents.json (title and id fields). Physical PDF filename unchanged to preserve file-system continuity. A client-side redirect from /documents/*dinks* to /documents/*dinka* was added to maintain external link integrity.

entries.summary: Internal document links migrated from raw PDF paths to canonical /documents/:slug routes
entries.detail: All internal anchor tags pointing to PDF file paths were replaced with React Router Link components targeting the canonical document page at /documents/{id}. Affected components: DocumentReference, DocumentViewer, Archive.

entries.summary: SHA-256 checksums computed for all 91 archived PDFs and added to document metadata panel
entries.detail: Build-time SHA-256 hashes generated via Node crypto for every PDF in public/documents/. Checksums exported to public/exports/roa-checksums.json and bundled into src/data/roa-checksums.json for client-side display on document pages. No document content was altered.
